Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — twenty-two couplets

BodAddA268.First Lines:
Mary Ihesu modyr dere praye þe lady þu me hereas
                    þu art moder & maiden clenenow to þe lady I me
                    mene…
BodAddA268.Last Lines:
…And þat hit be to þi louyngOn knees I shal ye say
                    gretyng
BodAddA268.Note:
At the end: ‘Aue maria gracia plena dominus
                    tecum’.
